# Landing Zone â€“ Online

The online landing zone is intended for **internet-facing workloads**.

## Scope

This layer defines a workload boundary with a security posture appropriate for public exposure.

### Resources typically managed here

- Online-specific resource groups
- Spoke virtual network
- Subnets for public-facing services
- Network security controls
- Hub-to-spoke VNet peering

## Intended workload types

- Public APIs
- Web applications
- Edge-facing services

## Notes

This landing zone is optional and may be deployed later depending on needs.
